executable.title: AAA_ComputeRPI
executable.description: Computes the Rupture Potential Index (RPI) for a AAA as the ratio between the stress in the AAA wall and the AAA wall strength. The wall strength is computed based on the formula by Vande Geest et. all 2006, Annals of Biomedical Engineering, 34(7), with the diameter of the infrarenal aorta (needed in the computation of NORD) calculated in a plane normal to Oz at 1 mm below the top of the segmented AAA.
executable.contributor: Grand Joldes (ISML at The University of Western Australia)
executable.acknowledgements: This work was partially funded by NHMRC grant no. APP1063986.

geometry.name: AAASurface
geometry.label: AAA Surface Output
geometry.description: AAA Wall surface Output file, containing computed RPI.
